specialization.title: Cloud Architecture & DevOps
specialization.description: Design and implementation of scalable, secure, and cost-effective cloud infrastructure with automated CI/CD pipelines.
benefits: Scalable infrastructure that grows with your business
Automated deployment pipelines for faster releases
technologies: Azure (App Service, Functions, DevOps, Cosmos DB)

relatedSpecializations.title: Full Stack Development
relatedSpecializations.description: End-to-end web and mobile application development with modern frameworks and best practices for scalable, maintainable code.
benefits: Seamless integration between frontend and backend
Performance optimization for fast load times
Responsive design for all device sizes
technologies: Backend: Node.js, Express, Python, Django, Flask, Java Spring, C#, .NET Core
Mobile: React Native, Flutter, Swift (iOS), Kotlin (Android)
Database: MongoDB, PostgreSQL, SQL Server, Azure Cosmos DB
ORM: Mongoose, Sequelize, SQLAlchemy, Django ORM, Entity Framework, Hibernate

relatedSpecializations.title: Mobile Development
relatedSpecializations.description: Creation of native and cross-platform mobile applications for iOS and Android with a focus on performance, user experience and platform-specific design guidelines.
benefits: Intuitive user interfaces following platform guidelines
Integration with device features (camera, GPS, etc.)

relatedSpecializations.title: Frontend Development
relatedSpecializations.description: Creation of intuitive, responsive user interfaces with modern JavaScript frameworks and UI/UX best practices.
benefits: Responsive designs that work on all devices
